koncat-0.1.0.0: An experimental, modular IRC Bot

PortabilityLinux
StabilityUnstable
Maintainergrab@thereisnobreak.net
Safe HaskellNone

Koncat.Module

Description

Koncat.Module is responsible for starting and stopping Modules, checking if the Module isn't annoying the IRC Server (for example flooding it, which could also lead into the server killing our bot) and providing the Modules with the Koncat API

Synopsis

  • execMod :: ModuleCall -> IRC ()
  • constructModuleCall :: (GenericIRC, IRCCommand) -> String -> ModuleCall

Documentation

execMod :: ModuleCall -> IRC ()Source

Execute a Module, streaming its output into IRC.

constructModuleCallSource

Arguments

:: (GenericIRC, IRCCommand)

Information about the user, information about the command the user issued

-> String

the modulePath, as retrieved via Koncat.Source.expose
